summary: Slipknot is an American heavy metal band from Iowa, formed in 1995. They're famous for their intense music, wild live shows, and unique look. The band's lineup has changed over the years, but they originally had nine members. Slipknot gained popularity quickly after releasing their first album in 1999. They've since released several albums, including "Iowa" and "All Hope Is Gone," which hit number one in the US. The band has sold millions of records worldwide. Unfortunately, they've also experienced some sad events, like the deaths of bassist Paul Gray and drummer Joey Jordison's departure.
title: Slipknot (band)
